front.title: Tuning the Behavior of IGMP and MLD for Mobile Hosts and Routers

abstract.t: IGMP and MLD are the protocols used by hosts to report their IPmulticast group memberships to neighboring multicast routers. Thisdocument describes the ways of IGMPv3 and MLDv2 protocol optimizationfor mobility, and aims to become a guideline for query and othertimers tuning.
